1.0.name: wordpress/inspector-wordpress
1.0.description:
This plugin monitors each request to your wordpress blog and based on conditions you can define in the options pane it interrupts the attacker's action and logs it.

Under "Dashboard"->"Inspector Wordpress" you can see all attempts. Under "Manage"->"Logs" you can delete all logged attempts. Under "Options"->"Inspector Wordpress" you can edit the conditions and behaviour of "InspectorWordpress".

If you want to discuss InspectorWordpress send your concerns to:

inspector-wordpress@googlegroups.com
